ygData.subject: Idea on vial creation.
ygData.msgSnippet: Just an idea.  Vials need to be sealed, so wouldn t a cork be required?  I would think so and they can be found in Steamfont at the 3rd Windmill.  Also, I
ygData.messageBody:
Just an idea. Vials need to be sealed, so wouldn't a cork be required? I would think so and they can be found in Steamfont at the 3rd Windmill. Also, I would think that vials could be used for storing potions too. So that would have us two classes that require our services.

Gnish, Mage of Death
16th Sacrificial Dagger, Bristlebane
Beginning Potter (which is why I bought all the pie tin sketches!)

> I can state what DOESN'T work for the Vial since I started taking Mix Notes by the time we started getting low on coin.
>
> The following combinations WILL NOT make a Vial:
> (Sketch and Water are assumed requirements)
> Small Block
> Small Block and Glass Shards
> Small Block and Metal Bits
> Two Small Blocks and Metal Bits
> Two Small Blocks, Metal Bits, and Glass Shards
>
> Block of Clay
> Two Blocks
> Block and Glass Shards
> Block and Metal Bits
>
> Large Block
> Large Block and Glass Bits
>
> The last two groupings (Block and L.Block)are guesses on what we used.
